Hullo, I'm Cameron!

Greetings, traveller! Welcome to my website! I’m Cameron, an author of fantasy books and a leatherworker, along with many other things! If you’re interested in seeing some of the projects I’ve worked on, go visit the Gallery, if you want to see my progress bars on future books and/or big leather projects, check out my Progress Bars, and if you’d like to hear music I’ve composed or some of my performances, visit Music!

And lastly, keep your eyes peeled, because this website will be constantly updated!
